qas.question: What famous music producer became CEO of Epic Records?
Who joined the CEO of Epic Records in becoming the CEO of Sony Music?
In what year did he become the CEO of Sony Music?
Who became the CEO of RCA Records?
What labels did RCA disband in 2011?

answers.text: Arista, J Records and Jive Records

qas.question: Morris Doug became CEO in what year?
Warner Music underwent a restructuring after whose arrival?
Under Morris, multiple artists from Jive did what?
Edge Peter became the new CEO of what?

context: <a1_0>Doug <b6_0>Morris<b6_0/><a1_0/>, who was head of Warner Music Group, then Universal Music, became chairman and CEO of the company on July 1, <a2_0><b5_0>2011<b5_0/><a2_0/>. Sony Music underwent a restructuring after Morris' arrival. He was joined by <a0_0>L.A. Reid<a0_0/>, who became the chairman and CEO of Epic Records. Under Reid, multiple artists from the Jive half of the former RCA/Jive Label Group <b7_0>moved to Epic<b7_0/>. <a3_0>Peter Edge<a3_0/> became the new CEO of <b8_0>the RCA Records unit<b8_0/>. <b9_0>The RCA Music Group<b9_0/> closed down <a4_0>Arista, J Records and Jive Records<a4_0/> in October 2011, with the artists from those labels being moved to RCA Records.
